description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9rjvo","text":"The crystallization protocol and buffer conditions used to obtain Enterovirus D68 3C protease crystals suitable for XChem fragment screening. The crystal structure was depostited to RCSB PDB with code 8CNX.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":116,"length":5},{"key":1,"offset":201,"length":4}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8A3F363AA0AB48338B6BAEF8047A4CC5","url":"https://www.diamond.ac.uk/Instruments/Mx/Fragment-Screening.html"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A5EB9BF6AA1E4501A308E38963B1A44B","url":"https://www.rcsb.org/structure/8CNX"}}}}

","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bqaij","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8h300","text":"For long term storage keep the Crystallisation screen in the fridge at 4°C.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
